paswword_invalidate_tips: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase letter, lowercase letter and number (E.g. 123456Aa)
phone_invalidate_tips: Please enter the correct mobile number.
email_invalidate_tips: Please enter a valid email address.
cant_recieve_desc:
1. Please restart your phone and re-send
2. Please check your junk mail, or add the mail.zb.com email to white list in your email settings.
3. If these steps do not work, please contact customer support.
smscode_sended: The verification code has been sent
idcard_placeholder: Not required if account isn't currently verified
forget_pwd_tips: If you have lost your password and access to the Authenticators, please contact the online
search_input_hint: Please enter the relevant word to search
google_lost_tip: Cannot find your Google Authenticator code? Please log in to ZB.com on desktop to retrieve
scan_login: Scan the QR code to login
scan_login_confirm: Are you sure you want to log in via QR code?
scan_login_hint: In order to ensure the security of the account, please confirm this is your own operation
str_verify_device_hint: For your account safety, please complete verification
str_verify_device_hint_end: Please use ZB.com on desktop to reset your password/security items
str_google_auth_warning_hint: Your account is at a low security level, please enable Google authentication to ensure the security of your funds
please_install_and_open_the_google_authe: . Please install and open the Google Authenticator. Manually enter the secret key to get your 6-digit Authentication Code
please_enter_the_new_authentication_code: . Please enter the new Authentication Code into the input box above and complete the authentication
Please_hold_your_ID_document_and_persona: Please hold your ID document and personal signature
